title: Data Engineering Bootcamp
description: Master the core concepts of data engineering, including ETL processes, data lakes, and modern big data tools.

title: DevOps Masterclass
description: Learn how to automate your development workflow with DevOps, leveraging CI/CD pipelines, Kubernetes, Docker, and Terraform.

title: Design Patterns Workshop
description: Understand and implement common design patterns to create more efficient, maintainable, and scalable software architectures.

title: Legacy Code Refactoring
description: Improve your legacy code by applying best practices for refactoring, optimizing, and bringing it up to modern standards.
